attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition for the CSA to be forced to pay compensation equivalent to the amount assessed, but which they failed to collect on behalf of the resident parent, thus minimising the financial hardships and child poverty the absent parent has have caused and they have in effect condoned.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
